Desc.entry: Khokanyana-Phiri is Sesotho for "a group of people coming together for a common goal". A charity which supports sustainable development, improvement of living conditions and educational opportunities for the public in the Malealea Valley in the little known country of Lesotho. Works in close partnership with Malealea Development Trust and facilitates community empowerment by any means. Organises visits by children, teachers, doctors, nurses, engineers, builders, electricians, sustainability officers and faith groups to help on projects.
